alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 27 at 12:52AM EDT until March 27 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EDT FOR MUSCOGEE...TALBOT AND SOUTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES... At 1252 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hollonville to near Howard, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Talbotton, Manchester, Waverly Hall, Woodland, Junction City, Geneva, North Fort Benning, Bibb City, Upatoi, Shiloh, Ellerslie, Laurel Hills, Vista Terrace, Cataula, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Baughville, Rose Hill, Flint Hill, Benning Hills and Avondale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Peachtree City. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
